content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Factory at position (0,0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (4.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (6.0, 0.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to missing coal for smelting
- Ensure to maintain a sufficient supply of coal in your inventory to keep the furnaces operational. Regularly check and replenish coal supplies.

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Make sure you have enough iron ore in your inventory before attempting to insert it into the furnaces. Monitor your inventory levels closely to avoid running out.

### Errors when attempting to smelt with empty furnaces
- Check the inventory of each furnace to ensure they have both iron ore and coal before initiating smelting operations. If a furnace is empty, prioritize refilling it.

### Errors when harvesting resources
- Avoid harvesting from resource patches that are far away without sufficient inventory space. Ensure you have enough capacity to collect resources before harvesting.

### General Inventory Management
- Regularly review your inventory to ensure you have a balanced supply of necessary materials (iron ore, coal, etc.) to support ongoing production activities.
